remarks: Closure of the column replacement function for identity matrices. (Contributed by AV, 15-Feb-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 26-Feb-2019.)
statement:
marepvcl.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
marepvcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
marepvcl.v $e |- V = ( ( Base ` R ) ^m N ) $.
ma1repvcl.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) $.
ma1repvcl $p |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ N e. Fin ) /\ ( C e. V /\ K e. N ) ) -> ( ( .1. ( N matRepV R ) C ) ` K ) e. B ) $.
